title: Heimerdinger Alien Invader Skin

embed.description: Full animated 3D models for LoL champion Alien Invader Heimerdinger, try all of the skins!

body: Is there anyway to buy this skin? I was told by someone it should have come out at halloween, but it didnt.

replies.body: it was available during "Sugar Rush" in August, not for Halloween. It will be out again on some special event, but probably not for a few months. It costs 1820RP.
Cool, thanks for the info guys.

Gotta wait for it to return on one of the many occasions that Riot brings back the legacy skins.
It is not a Halloween skin.
You will not be able to see it in the shop because atm it is not available.

> Is there anyway to buy this skin? I was told by someone it should have come out at halloween, but it didnt.

It is a Legacy skin and whoever told you that it would be out at Halloween is an idiot.
lol, I cant see it anywhere in the shop, otherwise I wouldnt have posted this.
